explains: n. （教堂内的）忏悔室；坦白；忏悔
adj. 自白的；忏悔的；与信仰有关的

sentences.en: The convictions rest solely on disputed witness and confessional statements.
sentences.cn: 定罪仅仅基于有争议的证人和忏悔的声明。

sentences.en: Because the subject matter was so personal, the work of several prominent mid-twentieth century poets has been termed "confessional" poetry.
sentences.cn: 由于题材过于个人化，二十世纪中叶几位著名诗人的作品被称为“自白”诗。

sentences.en: To treat their poems mainly as documents of personal experience is not just to diminish the poets' achievement, but to ignore their unanimous disdain for the idea of confessional poetry.
sentences.cn: 把他们的诗歌主要看成是个人经历的文献，不仅贬低了他们的成就，而且忽视了他们对自白诗的一致鄙视。
